derivation: or תַּחְבּוּלָה; from H2254 (חָבַל) as denominative from H2256 (חֶבֶל);
outline:
1. direction, counsel, guidance, good advice, (wise) counsel
    1. direction, guidance
    2. counsel
      1. good or wise counsel
      2. of the wicked
strongs_def: (only in plural) properly, steerage (as a management of ropes), i.e. (figuratively) guidance or (by implication) a plan
